0.text: Innate: Periodically, Camille's next basic attack against enemy champions is enhanced to  shield her for  20% of her maximum health for 2 seconds from either exclusively  physical damage or  magic damage, based on which type the target has previously dealt most of against champions as well as on Camille's current  armor and  magic resistance.
Active: Camille's next basic attack within 4 seconds has an  uncancelable windup, gains  50 bonus range, deals bonus physical damage and grants her  bonus movement speed for 1 second.

1.text: After 0.25 seconds, Precision Protocol can then be recast within the next 3.5 seconds at no extra cost.

2.text: Recast: Camille mimics the first cast's effects. If recast at least 1.5 seconds after the first attack, Precision Protocol's damage is doubled and 40% − 100% (based on level) of the total damage is dealt as  true damage.

3.text: Both casts of Precision Protocol  reset Camille's basic attack timer. The attacks' animations can be cancelled by casting other abilities, but the attacks will still land.

0.text: Active: Camille sweeps her leg to deal physical damage to all enemies in a cone in the target direction after a 1.1-second delay, during which she's  ghosted and is unable to declare basic attacks.

1.text: Enemies hit by the outer half of the cone take bonus physical damage and are  slowed by 80% that decays over 2 seconds, capped at 300 damage against  monsters. Camille is  healed for 100% of the post-mitigation damage dealt against enemy  champions in the outer half.

origin: 6 / 6.5 / 7 / 7.5 / 8% (+ 3.3% per 100 bonus ad) of target's maximum health
3 / 3.25 / 3.5 / 3.75 / 4% (+ 1.6% per 100 bonus ad) of target's maximum health

2.text: Non-epic monsters take 50% damage from Tactical Sweep.

3.text: Other abilities can be cast during the animation without cancelling it.

0.text: Active: Camille fires a grapple in the target direction. If the grapple collides with terrain, Camille will  dash toward and perch onto the terrain for 0.75 seconds. While perched, she gains the ability to cast  Wall Dive.

1.text: Camille will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during the dash.

2.text: Other abilities can be cast during the ability. Casting  The Hextech Ultimatum will cause the grapple to disappear if it is in flight.

0.text: Active: Camille  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies near the landing location. Wall Dive's range is doubled towards enemy  champions within 1400 units. Camille grants  ghosting to non-champions she passes through for 4 seconds.

1.text: Camille stops prematurely upon colliding with an enemy champion,  knocking back all nearby enemy champions a short distance as well as  stunning them for 0.75 seconds, while also gaining  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.

2.text: Wall Dive may be also cast with movement or attack commands. Other abilities besides  The Hextech Ultimatum can be cast while grappled or during the dash.

0.text: Active: Camille becomes  untargetable and  leaps with  displacement immunity towards the target enemy  champion over 0.6 seconds,  revealing them for the duration and  disrupting their ongoing  channels.

1.text: When Camille lands, she becomes targetable again and creates a hexagonal zone around her current location for a duration,  knocking away all other nearby enemies on impact.

2.text: The target cannot escape the zone through any means. While within the zone, Camille's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage.

3.text: The Hextech Ultimatum ends automatically within 1 second if Camille leaves the area or dies.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals ( 12% / 9%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion, heal for ( 7.8% / 3.6%) of the target's maximum health, with a minimum heal equal to ( 97.5% / 60%) base AD (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5% armor penetration, and 5% magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals ( 12% /  9%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion,  heal for ( 7.8% /  3.6%) of the target's maximum health, with a minimum heal equal to ( 97.5% /  60%) base AD (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Cleave: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal 60% − 12% (based on distance) AD physical damage to other enemies near the target. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bloodlust: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for ( 2% / 1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% / 3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 100 damage for 4 seconds, increased by ( 8% / 4.8%) maximum health per stack of Bloodlust, up to an increase of ( 40% / 24%) maximum health at 5 Bloodlust stacks (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BLOODLUST: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion,  heal for ( 2% /  1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% /  3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 35% / 15%) of all post-mitigation physical damage received, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: Champion takedowns remove Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heal you for 15% of your maximum health over 2 seconds.
